languages.text: "Этот ксенос..." {n}Словно хищник на охоте, Кибелла ловит каждое мимолетное движение мимики и тела друкари. Стальные когти ее руки раскрываются, точно зубья капкана.{/n} "Я слышу темный шепот крови, что течет по его венам. Вижу уродливые тени его умыслов по ту сторону зрачков. Чую запах его следов, сотканный из боли и ненависти тысяч жертв. Сколько нитей было им оборвано — и сколько еще будет…"

traits.locale_text: "Этот ксенос..." {n}Словно хищник на охоте, Кибелла ловит каждое мимолетное движение мимики и тела друкари. Стальные когти ее руки раскрываются, точно зубья капкана.{/n} "Я слышу темный шепот крови, что течет по его венам. Вижу уродливые тени его умыслов по ту сторону зрачков. Чую запах его следов, сотканный из боли и ненависти тысяч жертв. Сколько нитей было им оборвано — и сколько еще будет…"

languages.text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."

languages.text: «Este xenos...». {n}Como un depredador al acecho, Kibellah sigue hasta el más fugaz movimiento del rostro y el cuerpo del drukhari. Las garras de acero de su mano se abren como los dientes de un cepo.{/n}«Oigo el siniestro murmullo de la sangre que corre por sus venas. Veo las horrendas sombras de sus designios al otro lado de sus pupilas. Huelo el rastro que deja a su paso, nacido del dolor y el odio de miles de víctimas. Cuántos hilos habrá cortado su mano... y cuántos más habrá de cortar aún...».
languages.original_text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."

traits.locale_text: «Este xenos...». {n}Como un depredador al acecho, Kibellah sigue hasta el más fugaz movimiento del rostro y el cuerpo del drukhari. Las garras de acero de su mano se abren como los dientes de un cepo.{/n}«Oigo el siniestro murmullo de la sangre que corre por sus venas. Veo las horrendas sombras de sus designios al otro lado de sus pupilas. Huelo el rastro que deja a su paso, nacido del dolor y el odio de miles de víctimas. Cuántos hilos habrá cortado su mano... y cuántos más habrá de cortar aún...».

languages.text: 「この異種族は…」{n}狩りをする捕食者のように、キベラはデュカーリの顔と体の一瞬の動きをすべて追った。彼女の手の鋼鉄の爪が罠の歯のように開く。{/n}「私は彼の血管を流れる血の暗いささやきが聞こえます。彼の瞳孔の向こう側に醜いデザインの影が見えます。何千人もの犠牲者の痛みと憎しみから紡ぎだされた、彼の足跡の匂いがします。何本の糸が彼によって断ち切られたのだろう。そして、あと何本が断ち切られるのでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."

traits.locale_text: 「この異種族は…」{n}狩りをする捕食者のように、キベラはデュカーリの顔と体の一瞬の動きをすべて追った。彼女の手の鋼鉄の爪が罠の歯のように開く。{/n}「私は彼の血管を流れる血の暗いささやきが聞こえます。彼の瞳孔の向こう側に醜いデザインの影が見えます。何千人もの犠牲者の痛みと憎しみから紡ぎだされた、彼の足跡の匂いがします。何本の糸が彼によって断ち切られたのだろう。そして、あと何本が断ち切られるのでしょう…」

languages.text: “这个异形……”{n}绮贝菈仿佛正在捕猎的掠食者一样，死死地盯着玛拉斋面部与身体的每个动作。她张开了手中的钢爪，仿佛陷阱的利齿一样。{/n}“我听到他的血脉中流淌着黑暗的低语，我在他瞳孔背面看到了他的阴谋留下的邪恶阴影。我嗅到了他脚印的气息，那是成千上万受害者的痛苦与仇恨化成的味道。他究竟切断了多少人的丝线？还会继续切断多少……？”
languages.original_text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."

traits.locale_text: “这个异形……”{n}绮贝菈仿佛正在捕猎的掠食者一样，死死地盯着玛拉斋面部与身体的每个动作。她张开了手中的钢爪，仿佛陷阱的利齿一样。{/n}“我听到他的血脉中流淌着黑暗的低语，我在他瞳孔背面看到了他的阴谋留下的邪恶阴影。我嗅到了他脚印的气息，那是成千上万受害者的痛苦与仇恨化成的味道。他究竟切断了多少人的丝线？还会继续切断多少……？”

languages.text: "Dieser Xenos ..." {n}Wie ein Raubtier auf der Jagd verfolgt Kibellah jede noch so flüchtige Bewegung des Drukhari. Die stählernen Klauen ihrer Hand öffnen sich wie die Zähne einer Falle.{/n}"Ich höre das dunkle Flüstern des Blutes in seinen Venen. Ich sehe die hässlichen Schatten seiner Pläne hinter seinen Pupillen. Ich rieche seine Fußabdrücke, die aus dem Leid und dem Hass Tausender Opfer gesponnen wurden. Wie viele Fäden hat er schon durchtrennt ... und wie viele werden noch folgen ..."
languages.original_text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Xenos ..." {n}Wie ein Raubtier auf der Jagd verfolgt Kibellah jede noch so flüchtige Bewegung des Drukhari. Die stählernen Klauen ihrer Hand öffnen sich wie die Zähne einer Falle.{/n}"Ich höre das dunkle Flüstern des Blutes in seinen Venen. Ich sehe die hässlichen Schatten seiner Pläne hinter seinen Pupillen. Ich rieche seine Fußabdrücke, die aus dem Leid und dem Hass Tausender Opfer gesponnen wurden. Wie viele Fäden hat er schon durchtrennt ... und wie viele werden noch folgen ..."

languages.text: « Ce xénos… » {n}Tel un prédateur en chasse, Kibellah guette le moindre changement dans l'expression du Drukhari, et même jusqu'au moindre de ses mouvements. Les griffes de métal qui lui tiennent lieu de mains se referment comme un piège à ours.{/n} « J'entends le murmure du sang qui coule dans ses veines. Je vois l'ombre hideuse de ses desseins au fond de ses pupilles. Je sens l'odeur qu'il laisse dans son sillage, entremêlée de la souffrance et de la haine de milliers de victimes. Combien de fils a-t-il coupés… et combien encore en coupera-t-il à l'avenir… »
languages.original_text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce xénos… » {n}Tel un prédateur en chasse, Kibellah guette le moindre changement dans l'expression du Drukhari, et même jusqu'au moindre de ses mouvements. Les griffes de métal qui lui tiennent lieu de mains se referment comme un piège à ours.{/n} « J'entends le murmure du sang qui coule dans ses veines. Je vois l'ombre hideuse de ses desseins au fond de ses pupilles. Je sens l'odeur qu'il laisse dans son sillage, entremêlée de la souffrance et de la haine de milliers de victimes. Combien de fils a-t-il coupés… et combien encore en coupera-t-il à l'avenir… »

languages.text: "Bu zeno..." {n}Kibellah, ava çıkmış bir yırtıcı misali Drukhari'nin yüzünde ve bedenindeki en ufak hareketleri bile izliyor. Elindeki çelik pençeler, bir tuzağın dişlerini andırırcasına açılıyor.{/n} "Damarlarından akan kanın karanlık fısıltılarını duyuyorum. Göz bebeklerinin öte tarafındaki tasarımlarının mide bulandıran gölgelerini görebiliyorum. Binlerce kurbanın acısı ve öfkesiyle dokunmuş ayak izlerinin kokusunu alabiliyorum. Onun ellerinde kaç iplik nihayete erdi?.. Onları daha kaç iplik izleyecek?.."
languages.original_text: "This xenos..." {n}Like a predator on the hunt, Kibellah tracks every fleeting movement of the Drukhari's face and body. The steel claws of her hand open like the teeth of a trap.{/n}"I hear the dark whisper of blood that flows through his veins. I see the ugly shadows of his designs on the other side of his pupils. I smell the scent of his footprints, spun from the pain and hatred of thousands of victims. How many threads have been severed by him — and how many more will be..."
